Property.name: Str.ProductDisplayName
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite

Property.name: Str.SetupAlreadyRunning
Property.value: Setup.exe is already running.

Property.name: Str.CancelSetupPrompt
Property.value: Are you sure you want to cancel the %s Setup?
Property.comment: if %s is used in the string, it will be replaced with [Str.ProductDisplayName]

Property.name: Str.CouldNotOpenCore
Property.value: The Setup encountered a problem while trying to configure your software. Could not access file: %s Would you like to continue?
Property.comment: string displayed to the user if the core .msi could not be opened during initialization -- %s MUST be in the string, it is replaced with the reason for failure

Property.name: Str.NoFolderAccess
Property.value: Could not access folder: %s
Property.comment: %s is replaced with the folder name

Property.name: Str.PathTooLong
Property.value: The path to the installation directory for %s is limited to a maximum of %s characters. Please select a different destination.
Property.comment: first %s is replaced with [Str.ProductDisplayName] -- second %s is replaced with [MAX_PATH]

Property.name: Str.Error.20000
Property.value: The serial number is invalid.

Property.name: Str.Error.30000
Property.value: IMPORTANT: You cannot install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite without installing Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2. For information about Microsoft .NET Framework, please visit the Microsoft Web site. http://www.microsoft.com/NET/

Property.name: Str.Error.30001
Property.value: The processor in your computer does not meet the minimum system requirements for the software. The setup cannot be completed.

Property.name: Str.Error.30003
Property.value: You do not have sufficient privileges to complete this installation. This installation requires administrative, or elevated privileges. Please contact your administrator and then retry this installation.

Property.name: Str.Error.30004
Property.value: IMPORTANT: You cannot install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite without installing Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2. For information about Microsoft .NET Framework, please visit the Microsoft Web site. 'https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48137' - http://www.microsoft.com/NET/

Property.name: Str.Error.30005
Property.value: The 64-Bit version of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite cannot be installed on a 32-Bit system.

Property.name: Str.Error.5100
Property.value: Setup cannot continue because a previous installation requires your computer to be restarted. Please restart your computer and rerun Setup.

Property.name: Str.Error.1638
Property.value: You cannot install this product because another version is already installed. To install this product, you must first uninstall the existing version.

Property.name: Str.Error.30500
Property.value: A newer version of this application is already installed on this computer. If you wish to install this version, please uninstall the newer version first.

Property.name: Str.Error.30504
Property.value: CorelDRAW Essentials and CorelDRAW Home and Student cannot be installed on the same computer. Your system has not been modified. To install the product, you must first uninstall your current CorelDRAW product.

Property.name: Str.Error.30508
Property.value: You cannot install this product because it is already installed. To change your installation from 32-Bit or 64-Bit, you must first uninstall the existing version.

Property.name: Str.Error.30509
Property.value: You cannot install this trial because CorelDRAW Graphics Suite is already installed. To install this trial, you must first uninstall the existing product.

Property.name: Str.CDTS.PromptForUpgrade
Property.value:
CorelDRAW Graphics Suite has been detected on your computer. CorelDRAW Technical Suite offers all the features of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite—and much more!

Click OK to upgrade to CorelDRAW Technical Suite. 

Click Cancel if you do not want to upgrade to CorelDRAW Technical Suite.

Property.name: Str.Error.35001
Property.value:
Details:
Unable to validate the serial number. An Internet connection is required to complete the installation.

Property.name: Str.Error.30510
Property.value: Your operating system doesn't have the latest updates installed so we cannot continue with the installation. Please install the latest updates for Windows 7, and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30512
Property.value: An Internet connection is required. Please connect to the Internet and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30511
Property.value: Error: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again later.

Property.name: Str.Error.30516
Property.value:
We are unable to install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2, which is required by CorelDRAW Graphics Suite. Please make sure that your operating system has the latest service packs and updates installed, and try again.

For information about Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2, please visit the Microsoft Web site. http://www.microsoft.com/NET/

Property.name: Str.Error.30517
Property.value: Internet Explorer 11 is required to install this product. Please make sure that your operating system has the latest updates and service packs installed, and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30513
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite cannot be installed on Windows XP or Windows Vista. Please upgrade the operating system of your computer, and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30515
Property.value: This serial number cannot be used to activate your trial version. Please sign in to your Corel Account to download your build from Downloads for Members and Subscribers.

Property.name: Str.Error.30518
Property.value: Your operating system doesn't have the latest updates installed so we cannot continue with the installation. Please install the latest updates for Windows 8, and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30519
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite cannot be installed on Windows 7 or Windows 8. Please upgrade the operating system of your computer, and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30520
Property.value: This version of the software cannot be deployed to a network. For information about installing the software to a network, see the Deployment Guide.

Property.name: Str.Error.30522
Property.value: The serial number you provided can’t be used to install this subscriber-exclusive release of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite.

Property.name: Str_PreInstall_Windows_Updates

Property.name: Str_RestMan_Header
Property.value: The following applications have been detected running on your system.

Property.name: Str_RestMan_Desc
Property.value:
In order to minimize the need to restart your computer it is strongly recommended that you close these applications before continuing.

Please, close these applications and click OK to continue.

Property.name: Str_RestMan_Restart
Property.value: Automatically close and attempt to restart applications.

Property.name: Str_RestMan_NoRestart
Property.value: Do not close applications. (A reboot will be required.)

Property.name: Str_RebootPending_Header
Property.value: Please restart your computer before continuing.

Property.name: Str_RebootPending_Desc
Property.value: The setup cannot install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite without restarting your computer. Click Restart Now to restart your computer and continue the installation, or click Do Not Restart to quit the setup.

Property.name: Str_AdminLicense_Header
Property.value: To continue installing this software, you must agree to the terms of the Corel Business User License Agreement (BULA).

Property.value: You must scroll down to the end of the BULA before you can agree to these terms.
